title: No Key fragments
body: I played lods of games and couldnt get a key fragment , most of the games were wins. I had good scores , descent cs etc. pls help   {{item:3070}}

replies.body: Key Fragments are random, while chances might be better early on because the drop rate is more of a curve until it resets.  More information on this can be found through our [Hextech Crafting ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide)guide.  You may also purchase keys from the store as well.

I really do not know why I do not get key fragments never my friends constantly play with me and they will receive the keys to the street as opposed to me the last 20 games when I won I got one key fragment and please look to see if something is broken or something please yours.
Key fragments are spontaneous, sometimes they drop, sometimes they don't.
